panels.description:
List of nodes matching currently selected filters.

If no nodes are showing make sure stellar-core nodes are scraped by prometheus by a job matching reges ".*stellar.core.*"
panels.title: Monitored node reachability

panels.description:
Quorum Transitive Critical Peers
Per-instance details
panels.title: Quorum Transitive Critical Peers

panels.description: Ledger age. 10s is considered critical and 8s warning
panels.title: Ledger age

panels.description:
Percentage of nodes with ledgers over 10s old.
Values greater than 35% are considered critical
panels.title: % of nodes with ledgers over 10s old

panels.description: Quorum fail at. Value of 1 means we'll fail if one of the peers fails.
panels.title: Quorum fail at

panels.description:
Percentage of nodes that have quorum fail_at of 1 or less.
Values greater than 35% are considered critical
panels.title: % of nodes at risk of quorum loss

panels.description:
Percentage of nodes which are out of sync.
Values greater than 35% are considered critical
panels.title: % of nodes nodes out of sync

panels.description: Quorum transitive changes in 5min window. Frequent changes might indicate flaky nodes in the quorumset
panels.title: Quorum transitive changes (5min window)

panels.description: App Post On Main Thread Delay
panels.title: App Post On Main Thread Delay

panels.description: App Post On Background Thread Delay
panels.title: App Post On Background Thread Delay
